entities.description: RC-DRUG OTHER THAN MRJ USE DISORDER - PAST YEAR USERS.
RC-DRUG OR ALCOHOL USE DISORDER - PAST YEAR USERS.

relationships.description: Indicates whether the respondent had a drug other than marijuana use disorder in the past year.
Indicates whether the respondent had a drug or alcohol use disorder in the past year.
Indicates whether the respondent had an alcohol use disorder without a drug use disorder in the past year.
Indicates whether the respondent had a pain reliever use disorder in the past year.
Indicates whether the respondent had a sedative use disorder in the past year.
